songs.title: Perfect*
songs.lyrics:
[Lyrics From Snippet]

[Chorus]
She told me that we perfect
So if we break up, I'm gon' turn into a serpent
She got a new nigga, well I'll be in they bushes lurkin'
With what? With a .40 what I'm gon' do?
I'ma​ merk 'em

[Verse]
Uh, that's a play on play, close the curtains
All this heartbreak shit blow like his name Kurtis
All she ever do is do blow and make me nervous
This a AP, not a Hublot
But let me stay focused
Lotti, Lotti you know, if you leave me
You're asking for the gun smoke
This is real, no cap, baby, no joke
You are my home, crack a smile when your name surfaces on my phone
Remember when I was in Europe, we was in a different time zone
Conversations, what we still made time for
By the way, I pop molly
I don't rock Tom Ford
My hobbies are catching bodies, riding bikes and skateboards
Instagram like "look at juice new girl"
Some of y'all is really fucking with his new girl
But some of y'all are like "Fuck her, that's his new girl"
Like who the hell invited her to live in juice world?"
I think Juice WRLD invited her to live in juice world
That's juice girl, nigga, that's not your girl (uh)
So with that being said
I'm holding her close, I'm taking off clothes
I'm taking her soul, I'm letting her know
That she really make me whole

[Chorus]
She told me that we perfect
So if we break up, I'm gon' turn into a serpent
She got a new nigga, well I'll be in they bushes lurkin'
With what? With a .40 what I'm gon' do?
I'ma​ merk 'em
She told me that we perfect
So if we break up, I'm gon' turn into a serpent
She got a new nigga, well I'll be in they bushes lurkin'
With what? With a .40 what I'm gon' do?
I'ma​ merk 'em
